function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High population density and communal living may increase the risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease spread and difficulty in containing outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Promoting vaccination, implementing hygiene practices, and increasing ventilation in communal spaces.","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV-C disinfection, and smart building management systems.","People":"Participants in communal living arrangements and densely populated areas.","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities, and community leaders."}]}
